name: part_000
file: tmp_【重大告知あり！！】FBKINGDOM Fest. #機密解禁フブキングダム【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [ES9vrNjxiIQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: An animated storybook-style prologue narrates the beginning of a music festival in the FBKINGDOM.
Shirakami Fubuki performs her song 'Say! Fanfare!' live on stage at the FBKINGDOM Fest.

subtitles.original: 王国内で繰り広げられる音楽祭。
subtitles.english: A music festival held within the kingdom.

subtitles.original: この日を待ってたと言わんばかりに国民たちは
subtitles.english: The citizens, as if they had been waiting for this day,

subtitles.original: 各々で応援するための道具を用意し、
subtitles.english: each prepared their own tools to cheer,

subtitles.original: そして、広場へと向かいました。
subtitles.english: and then, they headed to the town square.

subtitles.original: Say! ファンファーレ!
subtitles.english: Say! Fanfare!

subtitles.original: ほっと一息お茶ですぞ
subtitles.english: Take a breather with some tea

subtitles.original: はいどうぞ
subtitles.english: Here you go

subtitles.original: いつもの場所から元気よくせーのでご挨拶
subtitles.english: From the usual place, let's greet everyone with energy

subtitles.original: おはこん狐
subtitles.english: Ohakonkitsune

subtitles.original: 始めましょう。
subtitles.english: Let's begin.

subtitles.original: おしゃべりをしてもっと過ごす
subtitles.english: Spend more time chatting

subtitles.original: そんな毎日愛おしくて。
subtitles.english: I cherish those everyday moments.

subtitles.original: あれもこれも手を出したくなりがちです。
subtitles.english: I tend to want to try a bit of everything.

subtitles.original: 歌とかステージはまだまだ恥ずかしいけど
subtitles.english: Singing and the stage are still embarrassing to me,

subtitles.original: 支え合ってほら届けますよ、この声を。
subtitles.english: but with our mutual support, look, I'll deliver this voice.

subtitles.original: Say! ほらその顔を上げて
subtitles.english: Say! Look, lift up your face,

subtitles.original: みんなで手を取れば
subtitles.english: and if we all take each other's hands.

subtitles.original: High!
subtitles.english: High!

subtitles.original: まだまだ道の途中
subtitles.english: We're still in the middle of our journey,

subtitles.original: 世界を越えよう。
subtitles.english: let's cross over the world.

subtitles.original: Say! ほら推し事も
subtitles.english: Say! Look, supporting my favorite also

subtitles.original: 止まらない、全力ですから。
subtitles.english: won't stop, because I'm giving it my all.

subtitles.original: 夢を書き換えたら
subtitles.english: Once we rewrite our dreams,

subtitles.original: 追いかけ続けよう。
subtitles.english: let's keep chasing them.

subtitles.original: 共に繋ぐファンファーレ。
subtitles.english: A fanfare that connects us together.

subtitles.original: ちょっとやらかした時でも
subtitles.english: Even when I mess up a little,

subtitles.original: もう大丈夫！
subtitles.english: it's okay now!

subtitles.original: 気持ち切り換えて
subtitles.english: I'll switch my mindset

subtitles.original: ほっとしちゃう広場には
subtitles.english: and in the square where I can relax,

subtitles.original: 集合ですよ！
subtitles.english: everyone gather!

subtitles.original: 背伸びをして
subtitles.english: I'll stretch myself

subtitles.original: お腹減ったらすぐモグモグと
subtitles.english: and if I get hungry, I'll start munching right away.

subtitles.original: お茶の間いますか？なやつで
subtitles.english: With the kind of greeting like 'Is anyone in the living room?'

subtitles.original: 黒いあの子には内緒にしてほしいです。
subtitles.english: I want to keep it a secret from that black one.

subtitles.original: 仲間の力とお友達の皆さんとも
subtitles.english: With the power of my comrades and all my friends,

subtitles.original: 叶えたい思いは言葉にして
subtitles.english: I'll put my feelings I want to fulfill into words,

subtitles.original: 一つずつ。
subtitles.english: one by one.

subtitles.original: Say! ほらその手を上げて
subtitles.english: Say! Look, raise those hands,

subtitles.original: みんなで輪になれば
subtitles.english: and if we all form a circle.

subtitles.original: High!
subtitles.english: High!

subtitles.original: まだまだ成長途中
subtitles.english: We're still in the middle of growing,

subtitles.original: 問題ないでしょ。
subtitles.english: there's no problem, right?

subtitles.original: Say! ほら明るく元気な
subtitles.english: Say! Look, a bright and energetic

subtitles.original: 心が第一ですから
subtitles.english: heart is the top priority.
